page.title: Circuit City Cuts Quarterly Loss,Stock Up
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Circuit City Stores Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=CC.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">CC.N</A> on Friday reported a narrower quarterly loss as it kept a tight rein on expenses and sales of digital televisions and notebook computers rose, sending its stock up 5 percent.
